name: Polish Tanks
description:
Glory To Poland!

Play with your friends with local multiplayer, or with anyone else with multiplayer! Make sure to enjoy, and stay cheeki breeki

How to play non-locally?

https://www.wikihow.com/Open-Ports

Do it twice, once for UDP and once for TCP

Port Forward Port 7777

Send your friend your ip address after port forwarding and clicking host server

let your friend connect

and boom

have fun being a polish tank
